text:
doc.ai | Dev Ops gCloud/AWS | Palo Alto | Full Time | https://doc.ai

I am the Sr. Data Scientist at Doc.ai and we are in the process of building a novel blockchain, ML and mobile experience for patients. Contact us at kartik 'at' doc.ai.

We are looking for someone to help drive our devops, discovery and maintenance.

Minimum Qualifications: - Experience deploying and maintaining a micro service architecture - Experience with kubernetes/docker/ecs - Experience with MySQL/PostgresSQL and Mongo - Familiarity with HiPPA - Familiarity with blockchain tech
